apple.description: Apples are rich in dietary fiber, vitamins (such as vitamin C and vitamin K), and minerals (such as potassium and manganese). They are low in calories and fat, making them a healthy snack choice. Regular consumption of apples may support digestive health, boost immune function, and contribute to heart health.
apple.shelf_life: Approximately 1-2 months when stored in a cool, dark place
apple.ideal_storage_conditions: Store in the refrigerator crisper drawer, away from other fruits and vegetables. Keep apples in a perforated plastic bag to maintain humidity and freshness.
